underlying_goal: Verify whether the STEP 1-8 test improvements (error handling robustness and processing speed) were properly implemented and effective, and validate the actual processing times
friction_detail: Log rotation caused STEP 8 execution logs to be lost, requiring code-level investigation instead of direct log analysis.
brief_summary: User asked Claude to analyze and verify STEP 1-8 test improvements for error handling and speed; Claude confirmed a 92% speed improvement in STEP 8 but discovered a bug causing 0% success rate due to processing residual buttons from other sessions.
